metadata.title: CVE-2021-47013 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net:emac/emac-mac: Fix a use after free in emac_mac_tx_buf_send Inemac_mac_tx_buf_send, it calls emac_tx_fill_tpd(..,skb,..). If some errorhappens in emac_tx_fill_tpd(), the skb will be freed via dev_kfree_skb(skb)in error branch of emac_tx_fill_tpd(). But the freed skb is still used viaskb->len by netdev_sent_queue(,skb->len). As i observed thatemac_tx_fill_tpd() haven't modified the value of skb->len, thus my patchassigns skb->len to 'len' before the possible free and use 'len' instead ofskb->len later.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
